LISTICON.description: small logo or icon to appear in menu (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

BOTNAME.description: Name of The BOT (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

ICON.description: Icon to appear in menu (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

MAIL.description: Premium user number (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

YOUTUBE.description: Youtube Channel Link (leave it if you dont have one)

GITHUB.description: Your Github Account URL (leave it if you dont have one)

INSTAGRAM.description: Your Instagram Id URL (leave it if you dont have one)

NAME.description: Owner Name (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

FOOTER.description: Footer Text For The Bot (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

MENU_MESSAGE.description: Main footer Message To Be Shown In Main Menu (shows when use command .menu) (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

APP_NAME.description: Heroku App name to manage the worker (you canot use restart if u dont fill thsi and HEROKU_API)

HEROKU_API.description: Heroku API key for managing the worker (You canot use restart if u dont fill thsi and APP_NAME)

ALEXA_ID.description: Add your Alexa ID here you got from Your Bot

ZENS_API.description: don't remove this api key bot will bot run, if it not work get api key from https://zenzapis.xyz.
